suspend fun send(
    sender: String?,
    recipient: String,
    subjectVal: String?,
    bodyHTML: String?
) {
    val destinationOb = Destination {
        toAddresses = listOf(recipient)
    }

    val contentOb = Content {
        data = bodyHTML
    }

    val subOb = Content {
         data = subjectVal
    }

    val bodyOb= Body {
        html = contentOb
    }

    val msgOb = Message {
        subject = subOb
        body = bodyOb
    }

    val emailRequest = SendEmailRequest {
        destination = destinationOb
        message = msgOb
        source = sender
       }

    SesClient { region = "us-east-1" }.use { sesClient ->
        println("Attempting to send an email through Amazon SES using the AWS SDK for Kotlin...")
        sesClient.sendEmail(emailRequest)
    }
}
